pricer.analysis¶

This script contains analysis of the cleaned panda parquet sources It creates outputs for dashboard and lua policy updates

pricer.analysis.analyse_auction_success(MAX_SUCCESS=250, MIN_SUCCESS=10)¶

Produces dataframe of recent successful auctions

pricer.analysis.analyse_item_min_sell_price(MIN_PROFIT_MARGIN=1000, MAT_DEV=0.5, test=False)¶

Calculate minimum sell price for potions given raw item cost, deposit loss, AH cut, and min profit

pricer.analysis.analyse_item_prices(full_pricing=False, test=False)¶

Generate item prices based on all past auction activity and scans

pricer.analysis.analyse_sales_performance(test=False)¶

Produces charts and tables to help measure performace

pricer.analysis.analyse_sell_data(test=False)¶

Creates dataframe of intellegence around the selling market conditions

pricer.analysis.apply_buy_policy(MAT_DEV=0, test=False)¶

Determines herbs to buy based on potions in inventory. Always buys at or below current market price.

pricer.analysis.apply_sell_policy(stack=1, leads=15, duration='m', update=True, test=False)¶

Given a datatable of the sell environment, create sell policy and save to WoW

pricer
